title: Pls nerf tryndamere's ult
body:
This ult is so toxic. this guy is as unfun as yasuo to play against, can go 0/10 and still be useful
has an ult that last 5 secs, while teamfights last less than 10 seconds! he can engage with E under tower, ult and kill you, and get out with E again and heal!
comes back to lane, and does the same thing. nerf that toxic ass ult. no one likes tryndamere, fuck that guy!!

Taken directly off the wiki. 

http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Tryndamere

ACTIVE: Tryndamere instantly gains Fury and becomes immune to death for 5 seconds, during which his health cannot fall below a certain amount. _**Undying Rage can be used even when affected by crowd control.**_

From personal experience, I've seen Trynd use his ultimate even under Lissandra's ultimate.

Crowd control is very effective against it though and it's easily countered. And while it's on cooldown, he's pretty squishy other than his garbage heal that consumes all his rage, which is a large part of his damage power
